info.description: This page provides information about the RESTful API (version 1.0) of AgroLD.
info.title: AgroLD API 1.0 Interactive Documentation

tags.name: ontologies
tags.description: Services over ontologies used in AgroLD

get.summary: Returns all the IDs corresponding to an ontological term

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: The keyword (e.g. homoaconitate)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: number (>= 0) of the page of the result set to display (0 = the first page by default)

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: size of a page of the result set. If = 0 then all results will be displayed. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: format in which the results set will be return (if empty or not supported, JSON is returned by default)

get.summary: Returns all the IDs corresponding to an ontological term

parameters.name: ontoTerm
parameters.description: The ontological term (e.g. homoaconitate hydratase activity)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: number (>= 0) of the page of the result set to display (0 = the first page by default)

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: size of a page of the result set. If = 0 then all results will be displayed. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: format in which the results set will be return (if empty or not supported, JSON is returned by default)

get.summary: Returns the name of an ontological element corresponding to its given ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id (e.g. GO:0003824)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: number (>= 0) of the page of the result set to display (0 = the first page by default)

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: size of a page of the result set. If = 0 then all results will be displayed. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: format in which the results set will be return (if empty or not supported, JSON is returned by default)

get.summary: Returns all the IDs corresponding to an ontological term

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of an ontological resource (e.g. GO:0004409 or G0:0016836)

parameters.name: level
parameters.description: The level of the ancestor (e.g. the level of the direct parent is 1)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: number (>= 0) of the page of the result set to display (0 = the first page by default)

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: size of a page of the result set. If = 0 then all results will be displayed. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: format in which the results set will be return (if empty or not supported, JSON is returned by default)

get.summary: Returns the parents of an ontological element given its id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of an ontological resource (e.g. GO:0004409)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: number (>= 0) of the page of the result set to display (0 = the first page by default)

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: size of a page of the result set. If = 0 then all results will be displayed. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: format in which the results set will be return (if empty or not supported, JSON is returned by default)

get.summary: Returns the descendents of an ontological element given its id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of an ontological resource (e.g. GO:0003824)

parameters.name: level
parameters.description: The level of the descendent (e.g. the level of the direct children is 1)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: number (>= 0) of the page of the result set to display (0 = the first page by default)

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: size of a page of the result set. If = 0 then all results will be displayed. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: format in which the results set will be return (if empty or not supported, JSON is returned by default)

get.summary: Returns the children of an ontological element given its id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of an ontological resource (e.g. GO:0003824)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: number (>= 0) of the page of the result set to display (0 = the first page by default)

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: size of a page of the result set. If = 0 then all results will be displayed. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: format in which the results set will be return (if empty or not supported, JSON is returned by default)

get.summary: Get the ontological terms associated with the QTL, and the association

parameters.name: qtlId
parameters.description: The id of the QTL (e.g. AQA001)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: number (>= 0) of the page of the result set to display (0 = the first page by default)

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: size of a page of the result set. If = 0 then all results will be displayed. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: format in which the results set will be return (if empty or not supported, JSON is returned by default)

get.summary: Get the ontological annotation associated with the Gene

parameters.name: geneId
parameters.description: The id of the gene (e.g. OS02G0803700, OS06G0127000, AT1G09040, AT5G38250)

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: format in which the results set will be return (if empty or not supported, JSON is returned by default)

get.summary: Get the ontological terms associated with the Protein, and the association

parameters.name: proteinId
parameters.description: The id of the protein (e.g. A0A060D1L3)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: number (>= 0) of the page of the result set to display (0 = the first page by default)

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: size of a page of the result set. If = 0 then all results will be displayed. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: format in which the results set will be return (if empty or not supported, JSON is returned by default)

get.summary: Retrieve complete description of a resource from AgroLD in JSON format

parameters.name: uri
parameters.description: URI of the resource (e.g. http://www.southgreen.fr/agrold/ricecyc.pathway/FERMENTATION-PWY)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: number (>= 0) of the page of the result set to display (0 = the first page by default)

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: size of a page of the result set. If = 0 then all results will be displayed. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: format in which the results set will be return (if empty or not supported, JSON is returned by default)

get.summary: list all the graphs of AgroLD

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: number (>= 0) of the page of the result set to display (0 = the first page by default)

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: size of a page of the result set. If = 0 then all results will be displayed. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: format in which the results set will be return (if empty or not supported, JSON is returned by default)

get.summary: Run a sparql query

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: a sparql query (e.g. select distinct ?Concept where {[] a ?Concept} LIMIT 5 , Describe <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/TO_0000040 >)

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: format in which the results set will be return (if empty or not supported, JSON is returned by default)

get.summary: Retrieve complete URI of all predicates used in AgroLD in JSON

parameters.name: graphLocalName
parameters.description: The local name of the graph in the namespace http://www.southgreen.fr/agrold/ of AgroLD (e.g. gramene.genes)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: number (>= 0) of the page of the result set to display (0 = the first page by default)

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: size of a page of the result set

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: format in which the results set will be return (if empty or not supported, JSON is returned by default)

get.summary: Retrieve complete URI and description of all QTLs from AgroLD

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: number (>= 0) of the page of the result set to display (0 = the first page by default)

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: size of a page of the result set. If = 0 then all results will be displayed. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: format in which the results set will be return (if empty or not supported, JSON is returned by default)

get.summary: Retrieve QTLs with URI or name or description containing the given keyword

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: The keyword to find (e.g. BNL6.32, flw4)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: number (>= 0) of the page of the result set to display (0 = the first page by default)

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: size of a page of the result set. If = 0 then all results will be displayed. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: format in which the results set will be return (if empty or not supported, JSON is returned by default)

get.summary: Get ids of QTLs associated with an ontological Id

parameters.name: ontoId
parameters.description: The id of the ontological element (e.g. TO:0000040, TO:0000207, TO_0000370)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: number (>= 0) of the page of the result set to display (0 = the first page by default)

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: size of a page of the result set. If = 0 then all results will be displayed. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: format in which the results set will be return (if empty or not supported, JSON is returned by default)

get.summary: Get the list of QTLs associated with an protein Id

parameters.name: proteinId
parameters.description: The id of the protein (e.g. Q9LL45)

parameters.name: pageSize

parameters.name: format

parameters.description: number (>= 0) of the page of the result set to display (0 = the first page by default)

parameters.description: size of a page of the result set. If = 0 then all results will be displayed. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: format

parameters.name: format

get.summary: Get URIs, ids, and name of proteins encoded by a gene given its ID

parameters.name: geneId
parameters.description: The id of the gene (e.g. BAE47665, AT2G19710, AT4G35730)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: number (>= 0) of the page of the result set to display (0 = the first page by default)

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: size of a page of the result set. If = 0 then all results will be displayed. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: format in which the results set will be return (if empty or not supported, JSON is returned by default)

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: size of a page of the result set. If = 0 then all results will be displayed. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: format

get.summary: Get publications of a gene

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: number (>= 0) of the page of the result set to display (0 = the first page by default)

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: size of a page of the result set. If = 0 then all results will be displayed. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: format in which the results set will be return (if empty or not supported, JSON is returned by default)

get.summary: Retrieve genes with the URI or the name or the description containing the given keyword

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: The keyword to find (e.g. FRK1, tcp2, stachyose, TBP1, fermentation, rice, oryza)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: number (>= 0) of the page of the result set to display (0 = the first page by default)

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: size of a page of the result set. If = 0 then all results will be displayed. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: format in which the results set will be return (if empty or not supported, JSON is returned by default)

get.summary: Get URIs, ids, and name of genes encoding a protein given its ID

parameters.name: proteinId
parameters.description: The id of the gene (e.g. Q35985)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: number (>= 0) of the page of the result set to display (0 = the first page by default)

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: size of a page of the result set. If = 0 then all results will be displayed. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: format in which the results set will be return (if empty or not supported, JSON is returned by default)

get.summary: Retrieve complete URI and description of all genes from AgroLD in JSON format

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: number (>= 0) of the page of the result set to display (0 = the first page by default)

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: size of a page of the result set. If = 0 then all results will be displayed. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: format in which the results set will be return (if empty or not supported, JSON is returned by default)

get.summary: Complete URI of gene's description by pathway

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: number (>= 0) of the page of the result set to display (0 = the first page by default)

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: size of a page of the result set. If = 0 then all results will be displayed. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: format in which the results set will be return (if empty or not supported, JSON is returned by default)

get.summary: Give me the genes on chromosome chromosomeNum whose start position is between chromosomeStart and chromosomeEnd

parameters.name: chromosomeNum
parameters.description: The chromosome number (e.g. 01)

parameters.name: chromosomeStart
parameters.description: The chromosome starting position (e.g. 10000)

parameters.name: chromosomeEnd
parameters.description: The chromosome ending position (e.g. 30000)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: number (>= 0) of the page of the result set to display (0 = the first page by default)

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: size of a page of the result set. If = 0 then all results will be displayed. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: format in which the results set will be return (if empty or not supported, JSON is returned by default)

get.summary: Retrieve IRI and name of pathways in which an id-given gene participates

parameters.name: geneId
parameters.description: Id of the gene (e.g. GRMZM2G004534, AT5G18200, Sb01g025590.1, LOC_Os02g35870.1, AT4G01970)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: number (>= 0) of the page of the result set to display (0 = the first page by default)

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: size of a page of the result set. If = 0 then all results will be displayed. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: format in which the results set will be return (if empty or not supported, JSON is returned by default)

get.summary: Get URIs, ids, and name of genes participating in a pathway given its ID

parameters.name: pathwayId
parameters.description: The id (local name) of the pathway (e.g. PWY-5337, FERMENTATION-PWY, TRESYN-PWY, GALACTMETAB-PWY)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: number (>= 0) of the page of the result set to display (0 = the first page by default)

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: size of a page of the result set. If = 0 then all results will be displayed. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: format in which the results set will be return (if empty or not supported, JSON is returned by default)

get.summary: Retrieve IRI and name of pathways given a keyword

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Id of the gene (e.g. fermentation, acetate)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: number (>= 0) of the page of the result set to display (0 = the first page by default)

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: size of a page of the result set. If = 0 then all results will be displayed. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: format in which the results set will be return (if empty or not supported, JSON is returned by default)
